inn1.comm: gets it to move away from a good length, but Mahela walks towards the line and is away with a pleasing drive past point, Umar Akmal does really well to charge after the ball as it speeds away on this fast outfield, pulls it back with a slide
lots of width from back of a length, that should have gone, but Dilshan went at it too eagerly and slapped it off the toe end of the bat to cover
and again, wants to hammer this pitched up ball through extra cover, mistimes it
tighter line, just on off from a length, pushed towards point
thought about it for an instant but then let this good length ball go past him outside off, some bounce for Gul
Gul was absolutely convinced Dilshan had edged this widish delivery on its way to the keeper, it was short and far away from Dilshan who thew his bat at it and seemed to have missed it
crack! too short, too wide, Jayawardene does not go hard at it, like Dilshan would have, he waits on it and times the cut past cover
wrong line, down the pads, and Mahela does not have work too hard to tickle it fine on its way to the boundary
looks to be in superb touch, rides the bounce in this shortish one and guides it down to third man
phew, that has disappeared almost as soon as it was hammered by Dilshan, that was in his slot, length outside off, he can get front foot out and dismiss it with quick wrists past short extra cover
and again, horror start for Cheema, nothing for the fast bowler in this pitch, Dilshan sees another length ball with some width outside off and carves it through cover with contempt
bounce into Mahela from back of a length, he drops it onto the pitch, close to the crease
lovely touch from Mahela, he eases forward and times this one into the gap between extra cover and mid off, and lets the outfield take over after that
defends a length ball coming into him back to Gul
drops this bouncing length ball towards point
there was some width but Mahela guided this back of a length ball straight to point
Gul brings some sort of control back to the innings after that expensive Cheema over, Mahela finds point again with his push
better start from Cheema, angles this nippy delivery in from a good length, Dilshan is completely at ease as he pushes to covers
another one, Cheema is leaking runs, Dilshan is enjoying his length balls outside off stump, bit of width, he stands in the crease, rides the slight bounce and cracks it past point
it makes no difference, he goes past extra cover now, Cheema angles it in, just around off stump, fuller in length, Dilshan waits for it to arrive and thumps it between extra cover and mid off

a breather for Cheema as he bangs this one in short, Dilshan unsure what to do with it, whether to pull or leave, is beaten in the end as the ball jags past his angled bat which has still not made up its mind
another short ball, better one, Dilshan is hurried as it screams in at his head, he opened up thinking to pull it initially but then decided that it was better to get his head out of the way
such quick hands he has, Cheema hits a good length again, and Dilshan explodes in a flurry of wrists to punch the ball to extra cover
Gul escapes some punishment, wide delivery, Mahela times the cut superbly, it flies to point's left, the fielder manages to stop the boundary
does the right thing, drops this back of a length ball in front of midwicket to get Dilshan back on strike
a hint of straightening from short of a length, lots of bounce too, Dilshan did what he does, he stood in the crease and looked to force it through the off side, beaten
no change in his approach, wants to belt this length ball through extra cover, mistimes it
the short ball got onto him quickly, it did not get up all that much, though, and Dilshan swivels to pull it to deep square
he has fallen so many times to this shot, but it gets him a lot of runs, rides the bounce to turn this one past slip to third man

well, Cheema has a wicket after all those boundaries, can't say he deserved this one, Jayawardene came charging out and absolutely middled this pitched up delivery, he just did not get enough elevation as he looked to go over the off-side infield, and found extra cover, where Hafeez held onto a sharp high take
and Cheema concedes another four, Sanga away first ball with a gift on the pads, clips the length ball through midwicket confidently
motions forward and across and defends the angled ball to short extra cover
moves across and defends this length ball down the pitch
another confident shuffle across and dead-bats this one back to the bowler
good line, sharp delivery, jagging across Sanga on a length, he lets it go immediately
tries to get on top of this back of a length ball but hits it straight  to cover
off the pads behind square leg as Gul angles it in too much
punched wide of extra cover for a comfortable single
tries the bouncer, Dilshan moves across early, and the ball carries well down the leg side
oops, that could have been close, Dilshan checked his push as this length ball seemed to bounce more than he anticipated, it went in the air but in the gap past cover

excellent work from the Pakistan captain at short extra cover, Sanga had got low on his knee and absolutely creamed this overpitched delivery, but Misbah saved four with a lunge to is right, stretched out his right hand and pouched the ball, Misbah smiles
pushed to short extra cover

Cheema has his revenge, he has bounced Dilshan out, Dilshan went for the pull even as the ball reared at him very quickly from back of a length, in no position at all for the shot, still plays it, a top-edge results, Ajmal manages to hold on somehow as he tumbles forward around midwicket, seems to have hurt his leg a bit
Sanga hits another boundary after a wicket has fallen, not exactly a bad ball, ending around off with the angle, Sanga closes the face as he gets across and clips it through midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
more nip from Cheema now, left alone with the angle outside off
back of a length ball defended tightly to short midwicket
shuffles across, opens up and eases this one angled across him to point
appeal for lbw as Gul zooms one in full to the new batsman, easily going down the leg side as Chandimal gets into a tangle
more effort from Gul, he is charging in, bounces from back of a length, not far from off, Chandimal leaves
pitched up ball driven neatly off the front foot to mid off

Younis Khan the outstanding slip catcher pouches a stunner, Chandimal ended up guiding the sharp straightening length delivery between the keeper and Younis at wide slip, nothing shot, Younis quickly goes low to his left and snaps it up cleanly, how many batsmen does this shot consume in limited-overs cricket, they check for the no-ball, it was close, but Gul had some part of his foot behind the crease
pushed to mid off
right on the stumps from a good length, defended tightly
pushed back in the air to the bowler
straightens from a length, left alone outside off stump
straightening on middle now, pushed back to Hafeez, 'yourself' goes Sarfraz
that wlll go, just some width, and Sanga slashes it behind point
driven to mid on for one
pushes a flighted ball to Hafeez
pushes this length ball away with the angle to extra cover
angled across sharply, left alone immediately
meets the fuller one with a good stride forward but finds mid off with the push
bounce from a good length, closer to off stump, not close enough, Sanga leaves again
shuffles across and opens up to counter the angle across him and drops it in front of midwicket for one
firm push past the non-striker but Afridi does well to get to his left at mid off and stops it with a slide
innocuous offbreak, punched to sweeper cover
wanted to force this length ball through point, it turned away and bounced, Thirimanne is beaten
turned towards midwicket
defended safely off the front foot to extra cover
neatly done, gets a shade inside the line and drives the flighted one along the ground to sweeper cover
pushed back to the bowler
gentle length delivery on the stumps, pushed away on the off side
diving stop at point  by Umar Akmal saves some runs as Thirimanne leans out to drive a wide one
on the pads, worked square
waits for the length ball to arrive and punches to extra cover, Sanga looking in great touch, so did Dilshan and Mahela, he needs to bat through
guided past point for a single
whoa, shuffles across and ends up well outside off to turn this length ball square on the leg side
drives a tossed up ball to the bowler
gets bat in front of pad to nudge from around off to short fine
they go for the single, direct hit needed, Umar Akmal's throw from point misses, even the dive wouldn't have saved Sanga, his bat was in the air as the ball passed the stumps
slapped wide of sweeper cover but they'll get only the single
eased off the front foot to long off
reaches out to a wide and full delivery to drive to sweeper cover
pushed wide of extra cover for one, Afridi lets rip, misses, and concedes another run

gone, Pakistan's catching has been high quality today, Umar Akmal latches on now at point, it was a very wide delivery, Thirimanne went down on his knee to try and guide it past Akmal, but ended up hitting it close to his right, Akmal moved quickly, got his body behind the line of the ball and took it safely
defended to extra cover calmly
opens the face and gets it past cover to get off the mark
leaves one angled across him alone
straightening on a length, punched to extra cover
defended back to the bowler
quicker and fuller on the pads, worked behind square
gets bat beside pad to defend down the track
full ball clipped straight to midwicket
outside off now, pushed to extra cover
mistimed to point as he looks to force a full delivery off the front foot
connects with the drive now but finds point
short, wide, Tharanga gets across and cuts hard, but cannot get it past point again
short and wide again, more bounce this time, Tharanga mistimes the cut, and Umar Akmal is in business again at point
this time he goes down the ground, to long off, and gets the single
quicker one, he bends his knee and cuts it with fast hands behind point
played out to midwicket
defended off the front foot
down the track, but Hafeez shortens the length and Sanga has to defend
well done by Hafeez, moves rapidly to his left and fields the push from Sanga
gets the run finally, with a push down to long off
some bounce outside off stump, guided to deep backward point
beaten on the drive by turn and bounce as he moves forward and has a go at this tossed up delivery
leaves this one alone now outside off
turning away from a full length, dabbed wide of short third man
gets bat around pad to nudge behind square leg
drops a quickish one in front of cover for a single
pushes back a length ball to the bowler
pushes to extra cover off the front foot
down the track, cannot get close to the pitch, pushes towards midwicket
now Sanga leaves the crease and earns a single through midwicket
chops the cut close to the stumps, Younis fields on the bounce
defended back to the bowler
pushed away to long off
gets on top of the bounce and punches wide of cover
pushed back to the bowler
plays a touch late, pushes a tossed up ball to extra cover
gets it past extra cover now to long off
turns on middle and leg, he adjusts to defend
nudged behind square leg for a single
eased past covers for one
punched down to long off
inside edge towards midwicket as this one comes in with the angle
too wide, easily cut away to deep point
punched from the crease to long off
drives a flighted ball wide of long off for a rare couple
angles it across the left-hander who opens up and punches to long off
full ball driven to long off
cannot get a widish one outside off past backward point
full delivery pushed in the air but well to the right of the bowler and past the non-striker to long off
skids across the left-hander who cuts hard past point, sweeper cover tidies up
turning in from off and middle, punched to long on
driven off the front foot to long off, accumulation mode on for Sri Lanka
pushed to extra cover
flatter one guided to extra cover
couple of dot balls makes him leave the crease, Hafeez shortens the length, and tharanga adjusts to drive to long off
easy single down to long off
eases a fliighted ball to long on
that will go, Tharanga drills a flighted ball through extra cover, sweeper cover is nowhere close to it
pushed to extra cover
turning into him, worked to midwicket
cannot beat midwicket with the nudge
flight and turn induces an inside edge square on the leg side as Tharanga pushes forward
defends a tossed up ball to Afridi
reaches forward and pushes to extra cover
goes back and punches a turning ball to long on
Sangas chance to go down the ground, and he picks up one to long on
driven wide of long off now
almost spooned it back to the bowler, was initially looking to push it towards long on, it turned and he ended up getting it to the right of Hafeez, fell well short
driven hard but straight to extra cover
whips a tossed up ball with the turn to long on
walks across, waits for it to spin in, and punches to long on
fuller one driven to long on, Afridi cannot stop it with a dive
they are using Afridi's pace well, this one is guided wide of short third man
another single to long off,
slapped wide of sweeper cover for two
well done, dropped off the front foot on the off side and Sanga is quick to get across
Sanga sees the short ball, swivels and thumps the pull past midwicket, in the air for a while, but it brings up the 50 of the stand
defended off the front foot
confident drive to sweeper cover, this stand is grows all the time
guided through point, and the Prof is done with his bowling stint for the day
steered wide of third man who does well to keep them to one
wide and full, slapped wide of sweeper cover
dabs this length ball and trots out but returns as he sees the point fielder get to the ball
chopped hard into the ground and over the keeper's head, third man gets around to it
that could have been played on, tharanga looks to bend his knee and flay one going across him, inside edge flies past the stumps to fine leg
he gets away with another widish one, Tharanga tries to slash it but misses
drives a loopy tossed up full ball to sweeper cover
well done, Tharanga earns a boundary, gets forward and across, opens the face and beats short third man's dive
swerving away in the air as it is bowled full and quick, squeezed behind point for more runs
worked to square leg with the spin
fuller, he nudges it to square leg again
diving near-stop from Misbah at extra cover but he cannot prevent the single
slapped away through point
looks to run it down to third man, succeeds, the  ball was in the air for some time
flashes and misses at one leaving him with the angle on a length, kept a shade low, was quicker too
this is what he does when he opens the innings, any width outside off, and he cracks it between point and third man, both have zero chance of stopping it
and again, this time he gets it down to sweeper cover
hardly a dot ball around, another single with a punch to sweeper cover
starts off with a wide down the leg side, slower ball that too
angles across him and he softly pushes it to the covers
fullish in length and he drives firmly down to long-off
pacier delivery honing in on the off stump and he dabs it down to point
tucks it away down to midwicket, he ambles back to his crease
taps it to the off side for a single
angles across him and he pushes it back to the bowler
this one keeps low as he tries to cut, nearly takes the under edge to the keeper
stays back and taps it to the on side
clipped to midwicket, Sangakkara wanted the run but his partner wisely sent him back
chips down the track and works it to the on side
punches it to long-on and he reaches his fifty!
now Sangakkara reaches his fifty with a push to long-on
pushed down to long off
worked to midwicket, who has a go at the non-striker's end, misses and they run for the overthrow
slower one down the pads, Sanga nudges it through square leg, and charges back for the second, makes it safely as the throw comes in
pushed wide of mid off
sharp short ball from Cheema, Tharanga is surprised as it whizzes past his head
worked square on the leg side
defends a turning delivery to extra cover
pushed to extra cover again
whips a flighted ball down to long on
pushes a tossed up ball to extra cover
whip-drives to sweeper cover for one
superb stroke from Tharanga, he is so strong in that region, it was quick, flat and skiddy outside off, he waited on it, made some room and used the pace to run it past short third man
superb running, a firm push placed wide of long off, and Tharanga scrambles back and makes it in the end
Ajmal races to his right but cannot cut off the push from Sanga, single to long off

Ajmal has gone through Tharanga, and then taken off on a run, the doosra, bowled with superb control, tossed up around off, draws Tharanga forward, he leaves a gap between bat and pad as he plays down the original line, the ball turns in a tad to go through the gate and rattle the stumps
length ball pushed back to the bowler
looked to be another doosra, straightened, drew Maharoof forward, and beat him as he pushed inside the line
played to midwicket
some width outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
back of a length ball punched to mid off
moves across looking to work on the leg side but cannot beat midwicket
turned square on the leg side
flicked down to fine leg
swings at a pitched up ball wide outside off, mistimes it to long on
Ajmal strikes again, what is it with Sri Lanka and Powerplays, Maharoof goes for the sweep, it is the doosra, turns away from his swing, he can only spoon it off the toe end of the bat to square leg
another doosra, spits away from the right-hander, let alone outside off
now he draws him forward outside off and beats him with away turn
defends the offbreak safely
another sharp offbreak, he defends it tightly
doosra now, Kula calmly keeps it out
widish one cut away to sweeper cover
Gul goes for the yorker, it arrives on the stumps, Kula digs it out
some width outside off, he tries to force it away but mistimes it to point
another one zooms into the blockhole, Kula keeps it out towards midwicket
hint of inswing as Gul targets the yorker length again, Kula pushes the full delivery to mid off
pushes from the crease, gets an inside edge on the leg side
flicked off the pads through square leg
loops in the air and falls short of midwicket as he tries to push towards long on
clueless against the doosra, banged in on a good length, Kula hangs his bat at it as it spins away and is beaten
pushes at this offbreak now, opens the face, gets it past short third man who has no chance to stop it on this fast outfield,
played out on the leg side
hurries with the angle across Kula and beats him
now Sanga is beaten as he looks to cut a widish one leaving him, kept a bit low
full delivery hit hard down the ground to long off

he's been given, Kula looks surprised as he walks back, 150th ODI wicket for Gul, who dug in the angled bouncer to Kula, it reared up around head height, he looked to pull it but could only edge it down the leg side to the keeper
drives a full delivery to point
goes for the yorker, ends up as a low swinging full toss, pushed to mid off
angles it well down the leg side on a length, and kicks the air in disappointment
driven hard into the ground and to extra cover
worked to deep midwicket for one
goes straight, he plays for the turn, about a mile inside the line
defends the offbreak solidly now
into the pads and nudged with the spin to fine leg
Sanga takes his chance, picks up this fullish one from outside off, and slog-sweeps cleanly over deep midwicket
keeps strike with a pushed single to long off

and he's struck first ball, a furious Sanga trudges off, he gave Cheema the charge immediately, looked to swing a length ball from outside off through midwicket, but the massive inside edge disturbed his stumps, Sanga swishes his bat angrily in the air as he looks at the damage behind him
goes for the yorker, tucked off the pads square on the leg side
played out with the angle to midwicket
mistimes the pull to midwicket
hits him on the helmet grille with a short ball angled in, Prasanna ducking right into that one, in another era, he would have had to leave the field
slower one goes wrong down the leg side
slips through Umar Akmal at point as Prasanna reaches out to drive a full one
offbreak defended off the front foot
and here arrives a looopy doosra, has the batsman pushing forward and beats him completely
chance for a run out as they go for the single in front of point, direct hit and he was gone but Younis misses at the non-striker's
dropped softly, too softly on the leg side, keeper gets to it
huge offbreak spins in sharply, and bounces to beat his cut
Ajmal loves this, he smiles after beating the batsman with yet another doosra outside off
has him ducking to a sharp bouncer on the stumps
punches a back of a length ball to sweeper cover
very slow and full on the stumps, Malinga does well to play it out to midwicket, was in the air for some time
a miss and a hit, Malinga departs, he backs away and has a heave, looking to go over midwicket, is nowhere near the line of the length ball which crashes into the stumps
lets a widish one go outside off with a top-orderesque shouldering of the arms
pitched up ball hit straight to point off the front foot
doosra again, pitched middle and zips across away from the right-hander's push
top-edged sweep, Boom Boom under it, but it loops over him and is just out of his reach at short fine leg
lovely control, top stuff, tossed up around off, draws him forward and beats him with bounce and the angle

that is it for Sri Lanka, down the wicket, tries to hit his way out of confusion, not a bad approach, but he gets too much under this tossed up ball as he charges at it, and scoops it up for long off to run in and slide forward to complete the catch

inn2.comm: full on the off stump and softly pushed down the pitch
this one leaves the right-hander and he safely leaves it alone
stays beside the line and taps it towards point
he opens the face of the bat and steers it down towards third man
the yorker swerves in and traps him on the boot and Malinga appeals for a leg before! Missing leg
full outside off and he squeezes it out to cover
wobbles in the air as it arrives just outside off on a length, defends towards point
he is cautious if one should nip back in, plays late and steers this straightish one to third man
lets it go past him with the angle, some away movement from the left-hander
appeal for lbw but that one pitched outside leg stumps, Jamshed missing the flick
steady and probing outside off stump, he stays in the crease and defends
smack! crispy drive from Jamshed off the front foot but the boundary is cut off by point's dive
drops a length ball carefully down the track
on a good length again, he shuffles and pats it back to Malinga
Pakistan have the time to play out Malinga if they choose to, he moves across this time and pushes to mid on, again very cautiously
appeal for leg before, Malinga is convinced, hits him on the pad with one that nips back in and takes him high on the pad, would have gone down and over leg
moves forward and across and gets the push in the gap, but cover's dive saves the run
remains largely side-on and plays out another length ball to mid on
pushes a length delivery quietly towards mid on
Sri Lanka not giving any width, not giving anything to drive, another one pushed towards mid off
this time he looks to drive through extra cover, feet not moving much, and he manages an inside edge to fine leg
moves across and defends a good length delivery down the pitch

not exactly what you would call an attacking stroke, but Hafeez times this one well enough to get four, stands in the crease to a length ball and punches it past the non-striker, mid on gives up the chase
length ball patted back towards the bowler
goes for the inswinging yorker, does not get it quite full, Jamshed drives to mid on
the slower yorker arrives on target now, searching for middle, Jamshed smothers it calmly
he hasn't timed the pull well enough, but this outfield is so much in favour of the batsmen now that midwicket has to put in a lot of effort to stop this one inches from the rope with a massive slide
tucked off the pad through square leg

Jamshed favours the on side more, his front foot does not get out all that much, he closes his bat face as he looks to drive an overpitched delivery just outside off, and mistimes it towards the bowler
ducks early underneath the bouncer
pushes hard down the track but Kula gets a hand to it to his left and takes all the pace off it
defends a good length ball to the bowler, this is an extremely watchful start from Pakistan
plays out a length ball, without much intent, to widish mid on
and again, pats back this length ball to the bowler, Sri Lanka are not giving much to Pakistan, who are content with the way things are at the moment
this one is pushed straight to Mahela at short mid on
slightly more intent on this push off the back foot from Hafeez, extra cover cuts off the single
beats him on the drive first up with some away swing off this full delivery
good length ball punched straight to mid off
this is what all the quiet overs do, Jamshed feels he has to charge out at Lakmal and belt him over extra cover, thick edge flies to the fine third man rope
this was close, it could have so easily carried to mid on, Jamshed pulled Lakmal from a long way outside off, the short ball had bounced too much, and he ended up spooning it on the bounce to mid on
oh well, how is that not out, that looked dead, unless the umpire sees an inside edge, Hafeez caught on the pad with one that nips in from a length, but there is a massive inside edge as well
shuffles across to a similar ball but finds midwicket with the clip
Jamshed charges out the second time, this time he has got it off the middle of the bat, gets front leg out of the way, and creams the length ball past extra cover
but Jamshed does need to charge out again to earn a four, this time he has stayed back, allowed the length ball to arrive on off, and whipped it well to the left of mid on
length ball played out to mid off
he stands a foot outside leg even before the bowler has released the ball, and cuts it from the stumps wide of third man
shot! Hafeez punches this one late, it scoots along the ground but straight to extra cover

it looked nothing more than a nudge on the leg side, but Hafeez's timing and the outfield combine to beat short midwicket, midwicket, Malinga almost chases it into the boundary before a big slide helps him back haul it in
the single looked closer in the end than it did when Hafeez purposefully came forward, pushed in front of mid on and took off
Jamshed tries the dab down to third man but is beaten
pitched up and hurries on at 136 kph, defended on the leg side
Jamshed has fallen to the pull, Dilshan had gone the same way, hurried into the shot by a skiddy short ball outside off, and only ends up lobbing it for mid on to come in and settle under it
is eager to get forward but is surprised by the bounce on this length ball and defends off the splice
away with a shuffle and a whip off his pads through square leg
pushed on the off side
top shot and top fielding, Hafeez makes room to punch to backward point;s right, Dilshan goes flying towards the ball and saves four
cannot do anything with the slower one, pats it down the track
pushed to mid off
eased out to cover from the crease
stays in the crease and defends to extra cover
outstanding effort from Dilshan at point, this one deserved four, it was cut so fiercely but Dilshan got in the way with a dive to his left, some anticipation and reflexes
confident forward movement and crisp drive to mid off
cannot force this one past mid on
misses the hook against a bouncer directed at his head, Sanga puts in an appeal for caught behind
another crisp drive, straight to midwicket

Younis is smoking almost everything off the middle of the bat, but that does not show in his runs column, this one was four all the way, a spanking straight drive, but the bowler somehow got a boot to it and parried it to extra cover
defends a tossed up ball

what a tame dismissal, but the bowler deserves credit for this one, he has done Hafeez in the flight, enticed him forward, then it dipped on him, Hafeez, already stretching a long way, went for the cover drive nevertheless, and only got it as far as backward point who dived forward to take a low catch
comes well forward and smothers a tossed up ball
worked off the pads past short leg
bat well in front of pad in forward defence
flighted ball driven back to the bowler, super start for Prasanna
Misbah defends, allows the length ball to come on, and squeezes it out from around off stump
pushed away from the crease to point
stays in the crease and runs this one on the bounce to point
tries the bouncer into the body, Misbah leans back as he pulls to fine leg

and another one goes, Pakistan in big trouble, a hole that they have dug for themselves with a timid start, Younis looking to flick vigorously through midwicket, he had fallen on this shot against Bangladesh too, what a catch from Maharoof, though, it was dying on him as he ran in from mid on, got his hands to it, but it almost rolled out as he went down on the ground, he somehow balanced it in one hand, even as it whirred on his palm like a spinning top
rides the bounce on this back of a length ball and pushes it to point
pushed towards extra cover
they need more of these, emphatic from Misbah, takes on the flighted ball, opens the face to get the placement right past extra cover, beats mid off;s dive to his left
the Misbah Block off the front foot, safe as a bank, a state-run bank
shortish outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
flighted ball blocked calmly off the front foot
driven to sweeper cover
nipped back in from back of a length, defended from the crease
off the pads and rolls away square on the leg side, would have gone down leg anyway
rolls away fine on the leg side, Sanga goes after it
very late decision to leave, walks and stands with back leg outside off, and in the end, raises his bat to allow the length ball to go past
bit of inward shape, but Misbah had it covered as he lunged forward and across to defend
played out on the leg side
makes him reach out outside off and drive, he gets it through cover
off short leg's boot and into the leg side, it was nudged straight towards him, but very, very low
driven back to the bowler
driven down towards long off
goes back to the length ball and whips forcefully in front of square leg, there is a man in the deep but it is too far to his left
worked wide of fine leg
plays out a bouncing back of a length ball to point
Misbah gets another boundary, gets some width, punches hard into the ground and out of even Dilshan's reach at backward point
tighter line, defended on the leg side
lets this one go outside off stump, Lakmal hitting a good length close to off
a full toss arrives on Misbah's pads, he works it behind square
tested by a 139.6 kph bouncer right into him, hops in the air as he tries to defend it, it pops up in the air off the splice and rolls away on the off side, Lakmal stares at Akmal
pushed towards mid on from the crease
well bowled, it straightens outside off from a length and Misbah pokes inside the line to get beaten
length ball played out to point
moves forward, Kula goes for the pads, Misbah gets bat down in time to work to midwicket
too much with the angle down the pads and Misbah earns one to fine leg with a flick
rides the bounce on this back of a length ball and drops it square on the leg side
and is greeted with a lovely cover drive, wide delivery, on a good length, Umar leans forward, get to the line and times it to the boundary
and again, classy stuff, Malinga goes much fuller in search of the yorker, Umar waits, he bends low and squeezes it past short cover, same result
pushes a full delivery back to the bowler and gets out of the way as Malinga threatens to throw it back

third boundary of the over, Umar Akmal's talent on display for the world to see, if only he can keep himself from losing his head, this time Malinga goes on the pads, there are two men in the deep square on the leg side, not that far apart, Umar splits the gap with a pleasing clip
pushed to mid on
now he wants a single off the yorker as well, easily digs it out with an open face towards Sanga, Misbah sends his sprightly team-mate back
Misbah brings a touch of calmness back to the innings with a shuffle and a block
full toss, he is surprised a bit as he pats it away to mid on
slower loopy one, Misbah comes forward and defends it towards short midwicket

this could be it, Misbah surprised by the bouncer, he goes for the hook, it flies in the air, Malinga is there at fine leg, the ball hangs in the air for some time, but falls short, agony for Jayawardene
Umar shuffles and defends a length ball
a short ball for Umar Akmal now, he does really well, considering that he is Umar Akmal, to control the pull superbly, along the ground, to fine leg
good length ball slips down the leg side
defended solidly from the crease, things looking steady now for Pakistan, Jayawardene hunting wickets all the time
driven to mid off
some width available, but he punches straight to cover
hangs back in the crease and defends towards cover, Maharoof keeping it tight after that wide
ends with a slower one on target, carefully patted back to the bowler
pushed to midwicket
lunges forward to defend a tossed up ball
bat comes in front of pad as Misbah blocks
eased out to extra cover as he makes him reach out outside off
well forward to smother one on middle
that hurried on from a good length just outside off, he goes back and across and keeps it out
smooth forward movement and he meets the length ball with a firm push, extra cover cannot stop it, mid off does
width available but he finds cover-point
slower one, he come forward, adjusts, opens the face and gets it to third man
punched to extra cover from the crease
again a lot of width outside off,  Misbah does not go eagerly after it, he just guides it safely to point
appeal for leg before as Misbah is hit on the pad with one jagging back in, height, angle, lots of doubt
paddle fine from around off stump, fine leg gets around to it with a long run
slapped away to sweeper cover
again he paddles from well outside off, slip and keeper start moving to their left as soon as they see Umar line up the shot, but he gets it wide of them
Misbah Blocks, off the front foot
and then he goes to the other extreme, Misbah sees the flight, he winds up, it takes some time before reaching it, and when it does, he creams it high in the air, and way over long on
back to the other Misbah then, a safe block off the front foot, calm, no fuss, was he the one who hit that six? really?
worked to deep square leg, brings up the 50-run stand
worked with the angle in front of square leg, Umar Akmal comes haring back for two
good take from Sanga, too wide down leg, he goes leaping with one hand and cuts off the byes
length ball defended towards extra cover
steered down to third man
defends a full slower one on the stumps, down the track
widish one pushed out straight to point
tossed up ball pushed away to extra cover
down the pads, helped along to fine leg
lovely to watch, he takes on the legspinner, against the turn, advances down the track, and lifts him over midwicket, not much power, a lot of timing
maximum now, Umar Akmal leaves the crease early this time, he wants a move-on, gets to the pitch, goes straighter this time with a massive loft over wide long on
after two tossed up balls go for ten, Prasanna cannot be blamed for dropping it short, but it is wide too, and Umar cuts him wide of sweeper cover
down the leg side from around the stumps, Misbah not  in full control of the paddle, but he gets it over Sanga and fine into the boundary
another sweep, Sanga is miles down the leg side already, but Misbah goes through square leg
in the air for a while as he pats it back to the bowler
tossed up slowly, he goes back and tucks it behind square leg
bat in front of pad as he defends calmly
opens up as he sees this shortish one, but whips it to midwicket
widish ball steered away to third man
pushed towards point
played out to cover
patted away to mid on
reaches out to drive to extra cover
keeps out a length ball to point
comes forward and works it down to long on
shortish, forced away with the spin to deep midwicket
fuller and nudged to square leg
worked away to deep midwicket, Sri Lanka looking a bit flat now
another four, Misbah fetches it from well outside off and laps it to the fine leg boundary, beats the man in the deep easily
skids on to off stump, played out to midwicket
motions forward and opens the face to earn a single to third man
another steer to third man
allows it to come on from back of a length and tucks it to fine leg
there for the straight drive, full and straight, he drives too, but the bowler gets a hand to it
defends a slower one resolutely, no getting past that Block at the moment
played out to covers from the crease
and right away the yorker homes in for leg stump, Umar is very careful as he jams down his bat on it
Misbah gets away, he half-chips a very full inswinging ball, and spoons it over midwicket
superbly done, Umar bends the back leg and squeezes a yorker outside off to third man
and when the yorker goes wrong, it is curtains, low full toss swings into the pads, Misbah tickles it past a helpless Sanga
does not quite get it near the blockhole this time, played out softly to mid on
safely fends away a short ball that gets big on him
leans forward to a slower length ball and tucks it through square leg
played out to point
keeps out a straightish length ball safely
hurls it full for the stumps, Misbah gets a straight bat in the way, bends low forward and does the Block
played out to cover from the crease
back of a length ball guided from the crease past point
full toss flicked to deep square
rides the bouncer and drops it towards point
another bouncer into the body, Umar fends it down the leg side towards Sanga, Umar took that one on the gloves and is in some pain
zips in from back of a length, and hurries in to him, jabbed away to midwicket
keeps out another short ball down on the leg side
Malinga is going for short ball after short ball, Misbah hops and tickles it fine but Sanga is up to it with a diving take
Dropped: Thirimanne the culprit! Akmal pulls a short ball, swivels and the fielder had it covered at deep backward square leg but spilled it
drops it short again and Misbah too pulls but he controls it, that's his fifty as well
brings up the 100 partnership with a cut down to square third man
that's a good yorker by Lakmal, Akmal nearly squirted that back to his stumps
slower ball and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
stays beside the line and he eases it wide of cover point, no protection there and it's four
full outside off and he squeezes it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he clips it down towards fine leg
wild swing and a miss outside off,  he clears his front leg and tries to smash it over the on side
short outside the off stump and he gets on the back foot and cuts wide of backward point, Maharoof charges from third man, dives but can't stop it
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls but deep midwicket picks up
nice inswinging yorker and he manages to dig it out to the on side
another short one, close to the face and he pulls him down to fine leg
digs out a very full delivery to mid on
punched off the back foot, point dives, in vain, third man gets around to it
a very high full toss from Lakmal surprises Umar, he is surprised but manages to pat it down, signalled a no-ball for height
gets front leg out of the way and the big backlift suggests an attempt at aggression, but in the end he stays beside the line to cut to third man
off the pads behind square as he misses the work
smack! that has been thumped away with power,  almost a tennis forehand, Umar picks up the short ball from well outside off and clobbers it high over midwicket
another short ball, another crisp confident pull, another boundary to midwicket, Umar Akmal doing justice to his talent, for once
as smooth as they come, Misbah waits for the full ball to arrive outside off, crouches and squeezes it out past point
flicks one close to the blockhole to deep square, Pakistan cruising now
opens the face and runs a widish length ball to third man
short ball into the body, the pull is on, Misbah gets it wide of deep midwicket for a couple
Malinga drops it short again, into Misbah, he swivels and pulls it through square
he is completely at ease with the yorker length around off stump, remains steady, bat comes down in time to squeeze it out to point
sets himself up for the reverse dab very early and helps it along fine on the off side
standing way outside off stump and bashes it down to long on
defended off the front foot
cuts the widish delivery violently, but straight to cover
make some room and punches from middle and off to extra cover
they go for the single after a cut to short third man, Umar has to hurry, but he makes it in the end
walks down the pitch before the bowler enters his delivery stride and works the length ball behind square
Umar launches this into the Dhaka night, opens up, clears front leg, and lifts the length ball from off stump over wide long on
down to fine leg for one
drives a pitched up ball back to the bowler
yet another short ball, going down leg, does not get up much, Misbah helps it along to fine leg with a controlled pull

he perishes, but after having set up Pakistan's win, wanted to finish it with another six over midwicket, instead he ended up hitting it high, almost vertically, in the air, I don't envy the fielder who has to settle under it, it is Tharanga, and he does a very good job in the end, tumbles down on the ground around midwicket, remains there for a moment, but he has pouched it
pushed away to extra cover
blocked off the front foot
beats him totally, carries straight on with the angle after being flighted, he ends up pushing outside the line
moves a long way across and outside off stump, and forces it to midwicket
Pakistan will get the bonus point after all, Azam finishes it with a loft between the bowler and mid off, takes on the tossed up ball on off stump, and mows it down the ground
